title: McMinn County, Tennessee
cleaned_text: Covid Testing & Vaccine Effective 1/30/2023 McMinn County Health Department will offer Covid testing on Wednesdays only by appointment 8:30 a.m. - 9:00 a.m. and Covid vaccines every Tuesday and Friday by appointment from 2:00 p.m. - 3:00 p.m. P.O. Box 665 393 County Road 554 Athens, TN 37303-0665 (423) 744-1604 Fax (423) 745-7431 Phone [Tennessee Department of Health](http://health.state.tn.us/) The McMinn County Health Department is jointly funded by the Tennessee Department of Health and the McMinn County Government and offers a wide range of services, including immunizations, testing, and check-ups for children. Contact the Health Department for more information. [The Mission of the McMinn County Health Department](mission_of_health_department.pdf) [Tennessee Breast
